% !TeX root = ../../main.tex

\newcommand{\ifarg}[2]{\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{}}{}{#2}}

\newcommand{\mathwrap}[1]{\ensuremath{#1}\xspace}

\newcommand{\cat}[1]{\mathwrap{\mathbf{#1}}}

\newcommand{\poset}{\mathwrap{\mathbf{P}}}
\newcommand{\toset}{\mathwrap{\mathbf{T}}}

\renewcommand{\P}{\poset}
\newcommand{\Q}{\cat{Q}}
\newcommand{\T}{\toset}
\renewcommand{\S}{\cat{S}}

\newcommand{\Fun}[1]{\mathwrap{\mathrm{Fun}(#1)}}
\newcommand{\Cat}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Cat}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Set}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Set}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Top}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Top}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Grp}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Grp}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Ab}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Ab}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Rng}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Rng}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Pre}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Pre}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Pos}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Pos}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Tos}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Tot}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Tot}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Tot}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Rel}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Rel}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Mul}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Mul}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Mch}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Mch}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\MMch}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{MMch}}\xspace}

\let\vvec\vec
\newcommand{\Vect}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Vec^{#1}}}\xspace}
\renewcommand{\Vec}[1][]{\Vect[#1]}
\newcommand{\vect}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{vec^{#1}}}\xspace}
\renewcommand{\vec}[1][]{\vect[#1]}
\newcommand{\Pers}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Pers}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\pers}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{pers}}\xspace}

\newcommand{\Fact}[1]{\mathwrap{\mathsf{Fact}\ifarg{#1}{(\mathbf{#1})}}}
\newcommand{\Arrow}[1]{\mathwrap{\mathsf{Arrow}\ifarg{#1}{(\mathbf{#1})}}}
\newcommand{\Arr}[1]{\Arrow[#1]}

\renewcommand{\Bar}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Bar_{#1}}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Barc}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Barc_{#1}}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\SBar}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{SBar_{#1}}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Barf}[1][]{\Fun{\op{\Int[#1]},\Mch}}

\newcommand{\Int}[1][]{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Int}_{\mathbf{#1}}}\xspace}

\newcommand{\Uni}{\ensuremath{\mathscr{U}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Pow}{\mathscr{P}}

\newcommand{\pt}{\mathbf{pt}}
\newcommand{\bool}{\ensuremath{\mathsf{bool}}\xspace}
\newcommand{\Trans}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{Trans}}\xspace}
